mapper.sql: a.id_ AS "id", a.user_id_ AS "engUserId", a.course_id_ AS "courseId", a.is_open_ AS "isOpen", a.status_ AS "status", a.create_date_ AS "createDate", a.update_date_ AS "updateDate", a.end_date_ AS "endDate", a.remarks_ AS "remarks", a.del_flag_ AS "delFlag", a.blank_one_ AS "blankOne", a.blank_two_ AS "blankTwo", a.score AS "score"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_course( id_, user_id_, course_id_, is_open_, status_, create_date_, update_date_, end_date_, remarks_, del_flag_, blank_one_, blank_two_, score ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{engUserId}, #{courseId}, #{isOpen}, #{status}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{endDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{blankOne}, #{blankTwo}, #{score} )
mapper.update: UPDATE user_course SET id_ = #{id}, user_id_ = #{engUserId}, course_id_ = #{courseId}, is_open_ = #{isOpen}, status_ = #{status}, create_date_ = #{createDate}, update_date_ = #{updateDate}, end_date_ = #{endDate}, remarks_ = #{remarks}, del_flag_ = #{delFlag}, blank_one_ = #{blankOne}, blank_two_ = #{blankTwo}, score = #{score} WHERE id_ = #{id}
